title: San Francisco/Civic Center-Tenderloin
name: Alcazar Theater
directions: between Jones St and Leavenworth St
content: Built in 1911 in honor of the Shriners (Ancient Arabic Order of the Nobles of the Mystic Shrine); this Byzantine-style Islamic temple (now a 500 seat theater showing Broadway and off-Broadway shows), is now a historical city landmark.  The architect was T Patterson Ross.
